mapper.select: SELECT NAME,VALUE FROM SYS_DICT WHERE 1=1 AND GROUP_ID = (SELECT ID FROM SYS_DICT_GROUP WHERE CODE = #{code}) AND STATUS = 1 ORDER BY SORT
mapper.sql:
SELECT D.ID,D.GROUP_ID,D.NAME,D.VALUE,D.SORT,D.STATUS,D.REMARK,G.CODE CODE FROM SYS_DICT D LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT_GROUP G ON D.GROUP_ID = G.ID WHERE 1=1
and D.NAME LIKE '%${params.name}%'
and G.CODE LIKE '%${params.code}%'
and D.STATUS = #{params.status}
